extendedInfo.description: Movie Reminder is not another cinema guide or TV guide that shows entire schedules. Movie Reminder displays movie schedules based on user preference. It offers movie preference setting whereby user can set their favourite actors or movie titles and Movie Reminder will automatically find related movie schedule in ASTRO and local cinema schedule based on the preferences.For example, if you are big fan of Tom Hanks and you are not sure what or when movies related to Tom Hanks will be aired on ASTRO or local cinema, then Movie Reminder is the perfect application for you. Today tab : Shows all today's movie scheduleFavourite tab : Shows only matched movie schedule based on "My Favourite" listCinema tab : Shows only matched cinema schedule based on "My Favourite" list  "Like" and "Comment" features (Touch on movie poster to show these features)Note : You will not see any movie schedule listing until you have set your favourite actor or movie title.

reviews.comment: Haaa.... Macam ni baru kita panngil baek punya appy. Hopefully I wont miss my fav. movies
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Not Bad...  expecting to have astro movies schedule.
